<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Demon Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=150)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 557 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted from black iron, this crude suit of _+2 resilient [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ is designed to make you look like a horned demon, with your face peering out of the screaming maw of the beast.

While wearing the armor, you can attack with the helmet’s horns. They are a martial melee weapon with the effects of a _+2 weapon potency rune_. They deal 2d8 piercing damage and have the deadly d12 trait. On a critical hit with the horns, the target must attempt a DC 30 Fortitude save against the [_Abyssal plague_ disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=1). The horns can’t be etched with any runes. 

 If you aren’t evil, you’re drained 2 and can’t recover from this condition while wearing _demon armor_.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69).

**Craft Requirements** You are evil; supply one casting of _dimension door_. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Demon Armor
